## Problem Statement
Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.
(e.g., "I'm frustrated when I can't see real-time telemetry on my phone during track days")

## Proposed Solution
A clear description of what you want to happen.

## Use Case
How would this feature be used? Who would benefit from it?
- Track day data logging?
- Rally navigation?
- Research/education?
- Other?

## Alternatives Considered
Other approaches you've thought about or tried.

## Implementation Ideas
If you have technical suggestions on how this could be implemented:
- Which modules would be affected?
- New hardware requirements?
- Performance/memory considerations?
